course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner II
course_description: Students will build on the foundation previous semesters incorporating management of common chronic and developmental/behavioral health conditions in infants, children and adolescents. Emphasis is on management skills and care team strategies to meet commonly diagnosed healthcare needs.
prerequisites: NRSG 664 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1453, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 3-6p, Instructor: J. Rodriguez, Status: Open
